Sentencas: Adetailed two-dimensional axisymmetric computational model of a flame fuel cell (FFC) unit was developed and presented.
Titulo: Mathematical Modeling of a Porous Media Burner Based Methane Flame Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The FFC unit is based on the integration of a fuel-rich methane flame in a porous media burner and amicro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Mathematical Modeling of a Porous Media Burner Based Methane Flame Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The model considered the coupling effects of the chemical reactions and electrochemical reactions and the heat-transport, mass-transport and charge -transport processes in the FFC.
Titulo: Mathematical Modeling of a Porous Media Burner Based Methane Flame Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The simulated temperature distribution and electrochemical characteristics showed good agreement with experimental data.
Titulo: Mathematical Modeling of a Porous Media Burner Based Methane Flame Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The coupling mechanism of the fuel-rich flame and the SOFC anode were clarified.
Titulo: Mathematical Modeling of a Porous Media Burner Based Methane Flame Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The Ni catalyst in the anode and the electrochemical reactions promoted the conversion of CH4 in porous media fuel-rich combustion.
Titulo: Mathematical Modeling of a Porous Media Burner Based Methane Flame Fuel Cell
